description.title: Imaging Sciences and Data Expert Analyses
description.vision: Passionate about technological innovation as a tool to facilitate quality of life
description.mission: Our technical background and research experience can streamline your innovation strategy
description.tagline: We offer the right set of skills to streamline your innovation programs

summary.part1: Innovation should be present throughout the whole lifecycle of a product. For example to develop new applications for your products, you will need scientific innovation, and to expand sales to another country, you will need market innovation.
summary.part2: With 15+ years of experience innovating in dynamic, highly specialised, multi-disciplinary and multi-cultural industries.

aboutus.part1: We are a consultancy business led by a qualified imaging scientist with extensive experience in developing quantitative imaging biomarkers and computer vision applications.
aboutus.part2: Our expertise spans across the pharmaceutical and medical device industries, as well as the energy and manufacturing sectors.
